text: I keep thinking of duplicating Calcium in Julia

elements.text: I keep thinking of duplicating Calcium in Julia

text: I expect it will be integrated into Nemo / Oscar at some point

elements.text: I expect it will be integrated into Nemo / Oscar at some point

text: But of course having native Julia would be nicer

elements.text: But of course having native Julia would be nicer

text: Its sad that it was considered, but he realised he could do it C, which makes sense. But I would love to try to see if a slower but easier language like Julia would change anything

elements.text: Its sad that it was considered, but he realised he could do it C, which makes sense. But I would love to try to see if a slower but easier language like Julia would change anything

text: I like his blog very much. I think he has a lot of novel and right ideas about how one should specify rules for symbolic computations.

elements.text: I like his blog very much. I think he has a lot of novel and right ideas about how one should specify rules for symbolic computations.

text: I agree that it's shame he's not writing it in Julia :disappointed:  C is probably right for the Calcium/rational computing part but symbolic part is perfect fit for Julia.

elements.text: I agree that it's shame he's not writing it in Julia
C is probably right for the Calcium/rational computing part but symbolic part is perfect fit for Julia.
